ComicInfo.Summary: When the team hears on the radio that the Boogeyman is on the loose again and threatening to eat children, they make an excuse to leave the house, even though they are in the middle of their parents' anniversary dinner. However, as minors, they are arrested by agents of CRADLE for operating without a license.
ComicInfo.Tags: James Power,Jack Power,Outlawed,Power Pack,Bogeyman,C.R.A.D.L.E.,Katie Power,Alex Power,The Bronx,Julie Power,Margaret Power,New York City
